translations: n．首次亮相，初次登台：一个人或事物首次公开亮相或展示的场合。
v．首次亮相，初次登台：首次公开展示或表演。

sentences.sentence: Kristen Stewart, who plays Bella Swan, also debuts on the list this year.
sentences.translation: 饰演贝拉-斯旺的克莉丝汀-斯图尔特，也在今年首次登上福布斯名人榜百强。

sentences.sentence: Windows 7 also debuts as Microsoft struggles with problems it has never faced.
sentences.translation: Windows 7的发布也正值微软面临前所未有的问题之际。

sentences.sentence: In the past two decades two new rechargeable-battery types made their commercial debuts.
sentences.translation: 在过去20年中，两种新型充电电池闪亮登场。
